meanings.definition: A sudden sharp pain or distress.
meanings.sent1: The panging in my head made me wince.
meanings.sent2: She winced in panging when she stubbed her toe.
meanings.sent3: The panging in my stomach reminded me I forgot to eat breakfast.
meanings.sent4: The panging of regret hit him like a sudden storm.
meanings.sent5: The panging of hunger was unbearable after a long day of work.

meanings.definition: The act of causing sharp pain or distress.
meanings.sent1: His panging of guilt kept him up at night.
meanings.sent2: The panging of the needle made her cry out.
meanings.sent3: The panging of the prank left everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her words were a panging to his heart, leaving him speechless.
meanings.sent5: The panging of disappointment was evident in his eyes.
